title: A user should see the newly redesigned calendar view
custom_preconds: GIVEN I am on the Yankees team page using the Android app
custom_steps: WHEN I tap on the calendar icon on the top right hand corner
custom_expected: THEN I should see the newly redesigned calendar

title: A user will see a calendar legend at the bottom of the calendar
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am on the <Yankees> team page using the Android app 

# you can user any other team you would like
custom_steps: WHEN I tap on the calendar icon to view full team schedule
custom_expected:
THEN I should see a calendar legend
AND I should see "Home", "Away", "Spring Training" and "Today" in the legend keys
AND "Home" should be colored dark blue
AND "Away" key should have a grey box
AND "Spring Training" key will have a gray box
AND "Today" key should have a yellow box

title: Calendar cells will be highlighted accordingly
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am on the <Yankees> team page using the Android app

#you can user any other team you would like
custom_steps: WHEN I tap on the calendar icon to view full team schedule
custom_expected:
THEN I should the calendar containing cells colored: blue, white and gray
AND I should see the home games in blue cells
AND I should see the away games in gray cells
AND I should see the spring training games in gray cells
AND I should see a yellow border for today's games

title: Each cell with game with contain information
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am on the <Yankees> team page using the Android app

#you can user any other team you would like
custom_steps:
WHEN I tap on the calendar icon to view full team schedule
AND I look into a cell with today's game
custom_expected:
THEN I should see today's calendar cell with yellow border
AND I should see the opponent team's name (2/3 letters)
AND I should see the game time

title: Game cell will contain win/loss value with final score
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am on the <Yankees> team page using the Android app

#you can user any other team you would like
custom_steps:
WHEN I tap on the calendar icon to view full team schedule
AND I look into a cell with a game that took place previously
custom_expected:
THEN I should see the game status in the cell
AND I should see a W or L with the score of that game

title: Double header view in calendar
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am on the <Mets> team page using the Android app

#you can user any other team you would like
custom_steps:
WHEN I tap on the calendar icon to view full team schedule
AND I look into a cell for Aug 6th, 2022
custom_expected:
THEN I should see "2 games" listed on that day's cell
AND I should see the cell to be in blue
AND I should see the opponent team's name [ATL]

title: List view toggle will bring the list view of the schedule games in the calendar
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on their team cal page
custom_steps: WHEN they tap on the list view toggle
custom_expected: THEN the calendar view will transition into a list view

title: List view will be dismissed when the user taps on the
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on their team calendar page List View
AND the user is viewing the list view of the calendar
custom_steps: WHEN the user tap on the Calendar view icon toggle
custom_expected: THEN the user will be taken back to the calendar view

title: Tapping on an upcoming game will bring up the Gameday game preview state
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on the team calendar page
custom_steps: WHEN they tap on a cell of an upcoming game
custom_expected: THEN they will be taken to the Gameday Game Preview State

title: Tapping on an upcoming game will bring up the Gameday game preview state
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on the team calendar page
custom_steps: WHEN they tap on a cell of an upcoming game
custom_expected: THEN they will be taken to the Gameday Game Preview State

title: Tapping on a completed game will bring up the Gameday  Game Wrap page
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on the team calendar page
custom_steps: WHEN they tap on a cell of a completed game
custom_expected: THEN they will be taken to the Gameday Game Wrap page to view the results of the game in more detail

title: Tapping on a live game will bring up the Gameday Game Live view
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on the team calendar page
custom_steps: WHEN they tap on a cell of a live game
custom_expected: THEN they will be taken to the Gameday Game Live view

title: "Today" button on the calendar appears
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on the team calendar page
custom_steps: WHEN the user scroll off of the current month
custom_expected: THEN the user will see the "Today" button will appear

title: "Today" button on the calendar disappears
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on the team calendar page
custom_steps: WHEN the current month is NOT in view
custom_expected: THEN the Today button will disappear

title: List View will display the scheduled games in a list view format
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on the team calendar page
custom_steps: WHEN they tap on the list view button
custom_expected: THEN the list view would load with their team’s schedule information (Time, opponent, date, month, year)

title: Double header games will not display game time but "2 games" in the time slot
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on the team calendar page
AND there is a double header game for the team I am looking into
custom_steps: WHEN they tap on the list view button
custom_expected: THEN the user should see "2 games" in the time slot

title: Game with today's date will have a yellow vertical bar indicating "today"
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on the list view
custom_steps: WHEN they look at the list
custom_expected: THEN they will see a yellow bar decoration to indicate the current day (this will dynamically update to be placed on the game that also shares today’s date)

title: When scrolled out of view, there will be a "Today" button to scroll back to "Today's" schedule
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on the list view
custom_steps:
WHEN they look at the list
AND they scroll down/up
custom_expected: THEN there should be a button visible labeled "Today"

title: Each game will be selectable for a double header game-day
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am on the team schedule
AND there are two games on a day that has past
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on the cell will display the text “2 Games”
custom_expected:
THEN the user should see an option with both game options
AND the user will see the "Gameday" view for the selected game

title: Double header games will contain each game result
custom_preconds: GIVEN I am viewing the calendar for a team with a double header which had taken place
custom_steps: WHEN I tap on the "2 games" cell in [list/standard] view
custom_expected: THEN I should see the results of each game

title: In list view, away games will be represented by "@" and the home games will be represented with "vs"
custom_preconds: GIVEN I am looking into NYY calendar for September 2022
custom_steps: WHEN I select the list view
custom_expected:
THEN I should see the away games represented with "@"
AND I should see HOME games with "vs"

title: Monthly Calendar Should Not Display Future and Past Month Dates
custom_preconds: GIVEN I am on the team calendar
custom_steps: WHEN I am looking at a given month (lets say April)
custom_expected:
THEN I will not see the last few dates of March (the previous month) on April’s calendar
AND I will not see the first few days of May (the next month) on April’s calendar

title: Game time hour should not contain a 0 as a prefix for the hour
custom_preconds: GIVEN I am on a team's calendar
custom_steps: WHEN I view the game schedule for a given team in standard view
custom_expected:
THEN I should see the game start time 
AND the starting hour should not contain a 0 prefix for the hour (07:10 pm)
BUT I should see the hour as 7:10 pm

title: Spring training games will be highlighted with light blue border
custom_preconds: GIVEN I am viewing the game schedule for NYY # feel free to use any team, please
custom_steps: WHEN I scroll to Feb 2023 [or any other Spring training season]
custom_expected: THEN I should see games highlighted with blue border

title: Each double header game will have GameDay page attached to them
custom_preconds: GIVEN I am on a team's calendar for the year
custom_steps:
WHEN I tap on a cell with a double header
AND I select a game from the native alert modal
custom_expected: THEN I should be brought to the GameDay page

title: Each double header game will have GameDay page attached to them in List view
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am on a team's calendar for the year
AND I am viewing the list view of the calendar
custom_steps:
WHEN I tap on a cell with a double header
AND I select a game from the native alert modal
custom_expected: THEN I should be brought to the GameDay page

title: Game time will be displayed in local timezone
custom_preconds:
# Note: 
- Change your device timezone settings from auto to UK. Disable auto timezone finding
- Find a game which is scheduled to start after 10 PM of EST for a date and make a note of it


GIVEN I am a user from UK 
AND I am looking at the LA Dodgers team calendar
custom_steps: WHEN I am looking at the game time
custom_expected:
THEN I should see the game is set to start the next day in UK time 
# Note
-  if the game is set to start on May 5th at 10:10 PM, it should move to May 6th in UK timezone.

title: Game time will be displayed in local timezone (Hawaii TZ)
custom_preconds:
# Change your device timezone settings from auto to UK. Disable auto timezone finding

GIVEN I am a user from Honolulu, Hawaii 
AND I am looking at the NY Yankees team calendar

--  Find a game which is scheduled to start early in the day.
custom_steps: WHEN I am looking at the game time for an early game
custom_expected:
THEN I should see the game start will be displayed in Hawaii Timezone
# if the game is set to start on May 5th at 1:10 PM, it should show about 7:10 AM (Daylight savings may vary the expected time).

title: Spanish days will be translated as: Do, Lu, Ma, Mi, Ju, Vi, Sa
custom_preconds:
# Note
- Change your device language to Spanish first
GIVEN I am on the team calendar 
AND the device is set to Spanish
custom_steps: WHEN I look at a team's calendar
custom_expected: THEN I should see the days abbreviated as follows: Do, Lu, Ma, Mi, Ju, Vi, Sa
